thread.title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Exchange Filing Shows Block Trade Of CITIC Guoan Information Involving 643.45 Mln Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Exchange Filing Shows Block Trade Of CITIC Guoan Information Involving 643.45 Mln Yuan

organizations.name: brief-shenzhen exchange filing shows block trade of citic guoan information involving

text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Shenzhen Stock Exchange :
* FILING SHOWS BLOCK TRADE OF CITIC GUOAN INFORMATION INDUSTRY CO LTD'S 75.7 MILLION SHARES INVOLVING 643.45 MILLION YUAN ($102.38 million) ON JAN 31 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2grA0v1 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2850 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
